pullrequest.title: Implement explicit platform definition for ignition prereleases

content.raw:
thanks @\_jrivero_ ; the rending bionic install job is working now because of 576f4f0

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_rendering-install-pkg-bionic-amd64&build=45)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/45/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/45/

but for some reason the rendering xenial install job is still being enabled

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_ignition/661/
